title: A vindication of the divine perfections illustrating the glory of God in them, by reason and revelation: methodically digested into several meditations. By a person of honour.
author: Stair, James Dalrymple, Viscount of, 1619-1695.
publisher: printed by J.D. for Brabazon Aylmer, at the Three Pigeons in Cornhill,
